text:
@GeorgeTakei Trump and Pence refuse to cooperate with universal masking, because its a global solution, to a global problem, and that's opposite of GOP's flawed nationalist ideology.
5.5 Billion people around the world are staying home, for all of Humankind. We are a global society. #Covid19
